{{ddcl|header=future|since=c++11|
template&lt; class R &gt;
void swap( promise&lt;R&gt;&amp; lhs, promise&lt;R&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Specializes the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::promise}}. Exchanges the shared state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|promises whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
